item.title: What's Wrong with Microsoft's Windows 10 Marketing
item.description: I was reading through Wired magazine and saw a Windows 10 ad. If you’ve turned on a TV the past month you’ve seen the ad I’m referring to, this is just the print edition of the TV ad.
